name: AddCampaignFeedback
description:
Add feedback to a specific Mailchimp campaign.

Use this tool to submit feedback for a particular campaign in Mailchimp. This is helpful when users want to provide input or comments about a campaign.

parameters.name: campaign_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp campaign to which feedback will be added.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: feedback_content
parameters.description: The content of the feedback to be added to the campaign.

parameters.name: editable_block_id
parameters.description: The ID of the editable block the feedback addresses in the campaign.

value_schema.description: The block id for the editable block that the feedback addresses.

parameters.name: is_feedback_complete
parameters.description: Indicates whether the feedback is complete. Use 'true' if complete and 'false' otherwise.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The unique id for the campaign.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the campaign.

parameters.name: block_id
parameters.description: The block id for the editable block that the feedback addresses.

value_schema.description: The block id for the editable block that the feedback addresses.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
